title: The maximum permissible basic floor space index, FSI on payment of premium, permissible TDR loading shall be as per the following Table No
clause_text: The maximum permissible basic floor space index, FSI on payment of premium, permissible TDR loading shall be as per the following Table No.6-A.
section: Residential Buildings / Residential Buildings with mixed-use
